extendedInfo.description: The XFINITY WiFi application makes it easy to locate thousands of XFINITY WiFi Hotspots. Features: â Map view â List View â "Near Me" locates all nearby XFINITY WiFi hotspots â Driving directions â Create and save a list of your favorite hotspots for easy reference XFINITY WiFi Hotspots: Tens of thousands of XFINITY WiFi hotspots are available in multiple US cities, including Philadelphia, New York, Boston, Washington DC, San Francisco, and San Jose, with more locations added frequently.

reviews.title: Useless without internet connection
reviews.comment: This is supposed to have a database of locations that it can check when you don\'t have any internet.  Maybe the data is in there, but you can\'t get it out, because it can\'t find the ones where you currently are -- all it ever shows you is the last neighborhood where you did have a connection.  It checks your GPS but ignores the result!  Then, to add insult to injury, it shuts off your wifi receiver.  Recent updates have fixed none of these easily solved problems.
reviews.author: Paul Kienitz

reviews.title: Xifinty WiFi
reviews.comment: Wonder if its only the area i live in.... Seems to work great for other areas...i live in the city of Ukiah Mendocino County Northern California
reviews.author: Turtle M.

reviews.title: Nothing I would pay for!!
reviews.comment: It would be nice if the name along with address of the nearest hotspot was provided.  Also, how can you map the nearest location if you don\'t have internet connection? ???...duh
reviews.author: yolanda johnson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Asus TF700
reviews.comment: Crashes every time. I\'d give it a 0 if I could.
reviews.author: William G. Hayes

reviews.title: Used to force close on start, seems to work now.
reviews.comment: Old Comment: Doesn\'t work at all for me.  Update: Appears to work as intended.  I haven\'t had a chance to verify hotspots yet.
reviews.author: fast cart

reviews.title: What did I really expect?
reviews.comment: Well, you can get an idea of how bad this is by reading every single other review.
reviews.author: Eric Cochran

reviews.title: So far so good.
reviews.comment: Not only did this app find me some hotspots, but it connected me to a network and completed download on an app I wanted. I hope my lucky streak isn\'t a fluke.
reviews.author: Cashor Farmer

reviews.title: So Disappointed...I don\'t know why...COMCAST!!!
reviews.comment: I have uninstalled and re-installed this app over 10 times from different locations.  This product does a Forced Stop after asking how to update (over WiFi only or WiFi or 3G/4G).  I\'m disappointed, but I don\'t know why, this IS a COMCAST product.  And anything they do for free has GOT to be crap.
reviews.author: Marcos F. Edghill, Sr.

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: This is junk. I m in Atlanta and checked for hotspot in entire metro area but all the time I got msg no result.  Uninstalling it now
reviews.author: Bhavesh Chaniyara

reviews.title: Its missing a major detail
reviews.comment: It\'s great for seeing where the hotspots are. Location service works good! Pretty big detail I think is missing is the name of the establishment at that address! Seriously, all I get is an address? Is this a Starbucks? Or Jos\303\251s\' Mexican Grill?
reviews.author: Nick Schmid

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: I have Verizon with only 6 GB of internet per month and this comes in handyto help keep me from going over my limit. I wish the hotspots were located in more locations.
reviews.author: Don Henry

reviews.title: Has Potential but...
reviews.comment: Looks like it could be handy if they had any locations. Doesn\'t even have any in Atlanta! Small town users might as well uninstall unless you travel a lot.
reviews.author: Sybil E Smith

reviews.title: Xfinity WiFi
reviews.comment: This App dose not work I\'ve dowloaded twice and it just keep telling me sorry app stop working\' it never worked in the first place. I don\'t know may be it will work for some of you!
reviews.author: Gerold Wilson

reviews.title: No result found at this location
reviews.comment: Useless ! Can\'t find any wifi hotspot in south east florida (miami & fort lauderdale)
reviews.author: Larry Otmane

reviews.title: Great App !!!
reviews.comment: Great App works great , never had any trouble finding a hotspot unlike the NooBs that rated app below par. Its called time to upgrade your crap phone and get with the times , then youll really see what this app was made to do !!!  Galaxy S4
reviews.author: Mike Garofalo

reviews.title: No wi fi locations
reviews.comment: Sooo how is this supposed to work with wi fi...when it doesnt even find a hot spot near where I am? Useless!
reviews.author: deon rhea

reviews.title: Nice idea but needs network connection
reviews.comment: It seems to need a network connection to download the appropriate map. I think this kind of defeats the purpose if you are using it to look for a wifi hotspot to get a network connection. It seems to work ok if you have a network connection. In the absence of a network connection and map perhaps it could just list the locations in order of proximity.
reviews.author: jon herron

reviews.title: Nothing anywhere
reviews.comment: Other than all the major cities where I am not at. I can never find anything. .. I have better luck aiming for mc donolds while on the road
reviews.author: Robert Gapen

reviews.title: Seems reasonably useful
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy S III: Installed / ran without hitch. Newer version of app? Installed over WiFi, did first update that way. Tested with / without WiFi, with / without mobile data, with both, with neither. Searched and listed hotspots in all cases, but as expected needs network connectivity of either kind to display map. Tried street / satellite view to ID locations: Tattoo parlor? Church next door? Definitely need names, but maybe privacy issues? Can\'t change \"home base\", but that\'s a minor issue.
reviews.author: Jerry Schwartz

reviews.title: Zoom-in problem...
reviews.comment: When I zoom-in on the map the positions of the red pins moves several blocks! The app is zooming the map and the pin positions differently!
reviews.author: Carl Gable Watts
